original_text: For he shall be like the heath in the desert, and shall not see when good cometh; but shall inhabit the parched places in the wilderness, in a salt land and not inhabited.
korean_text: 그는 사막의 떨기나무 같아서 좋은 일이 오는 것을 보지 못하고 광야 간조한 곳, 건건한 땅, 사람이 살지 않는 땅에 살리라

sentences.original_text: For he shall be like heath in the desert
and shall not see when good cometh
but shall inhabit parched places in the wilderness
in a salt land and not inhabited
sentences.korean_translation: 사람이 살지 않는 소금 땅에 있으리라
